category: Email-first marketing, automation, and commerce platform for creators

team.current: 89 team members across 72 cities (Kit about page)
team.press_release: 80-person, fully remote company noted during 2024 rebrand

product_summary: Email-first operating system combining email marketing, visual automations, landing pages/forms, commerce, Creator Network recommendations, and an app store for extensions.

pricing.notes: Free for up to 10,000 subscribers; 14-day free trial and free migrations noted on pricing page.
Paid plan with higher limits and advanced features.
Top tier with additional reporting and automation controls.

affiliate_program.commission: 50% recurring for the first 12 months; loyalty tiers add +10% (Bronze, 10+ referrals), +15% (Silver, 50+), +20% (Gold, 100+) after 12 months while active.

free_plan.offer: Newsletter plan free up to 10,000 subscribers as part of the rebrand rollout.

kpi.value: 100,000+ creators send 2B+ emails each month (pre-rebrand figure)

recent_moves.item: Public rebrand from ConvertKit to Kit and positioning as the email-first operating system for creators.
Launched app store, data hub, and free newsletter tier as part of the rebrand.
Acquired SparkLoop to add Paid Recommendations and audience growth network capabilities.

mission.statement: Help creators build more valuable businesses (mission page).
mission.vision_targets: $1B paid to creators, $100M ARR, 250k creators on platform, remain 100% independent.
